question: Do you offer a free trial period?
answer: Yes. Our free trial lasts 7 days from your signup date. Once the 7 day trial period ends, you may select a different plan which will be billed on a month-to-month basis.

question: What is a session and how is it measured?
answer: We define a session as an event in which any user visits any page of your website. Only new users within a certain time period will count as a new session. If you need further clarification or are unsure about your session usage needs, please contact us.

question: What other platforms are supported?
answer: Right now we only have a web platform accessible through any modern web browser. Native mobile applications for iPhone and Android are currently in development.

question: How may I cancel my subscription?
answer: Through the web platform you may deactivate your account which will flag our support team. You may reactivate at any later time.
